text: Despite his five Grammy Award nominations this year, Donald Glover confirms he still plans to retire his stage name, Childish Gambino. Last June during his performance at the Governors Ball Music Festival in New York City, Glover announced that his upcoming album will be his last. Backstage at the 2018 Grammys, he elaborated on his decision. “ I stand by that. I ’ m really appreciative of this. I ’ m making another project right now, ” he said. “ But I like endings, I think they ’ re important to progress. ” He continued, “ I think if a lot of things had death clauses in them, we wouldn ’ t have a lot of problems in the world, to be honest.
